name: Justice Prevails
description: The authorities catch a notorious criminal, exonerate a wrongfully accused innocent, shut down a major criminal operation, or thwart a plot against a settlement. Whatever the case, some injustice that has long vexed your citizens has finally been resolved.

criticalSuccess.msg:
The triumph of law and justice invites celebration. and reduce all Ruins by 1
  • @lose1Corruption
  • @lose1Crime
  • @lose1Decay
  • @lose1Strife
Alternately, if you’re suffering from a continuous Bandit Activity, Cult Activity, Drug Den, Inquisition, Sacrifices, Sensational Crime, Squatters, or Vandals event, you can instead cause that event to end.

success.msg:
A celebration of the common good delights the locals. @lose1d4Unrest or reduce two Ruins of your choice by 1
  • @lose1Corruption
  • @lose1Crime
  • @lose1Decay
  • @lose1Strife

failure.msg: Justice is done, but at a cost of bad publicity. If you don’t Quell Unrest at least once during the next Kingdom turn, @gain1d4Unrest at the end of the next turn.

criticalFailure.msg:
The victory is undercut by backdoor deals that let the guilty escape justice or reveal unpleasant secrets. @gain1d4Unrest, , and increase another Ruin of your choice by 1
  • @gain1Decay
